item.title: Distortio Radio Podcast 002
item.description: Another tin, another bag of invertabrates... stolen bike crusade ~ forgotten silver poison popcorn~ tony blair paradise ~ in circles new brutalism ~ 056.75 ducks pee ~ san salvador the ladderback ~ TTT el guapo ~ jacob p. silverstein yo la tengo ~ nuclear war (sun ra) poison popcorn~ tony blair ghostsaw ~ 1992 some stuff acquired from http://music.podshow.com

item.title: Distortio Radio Podcast 001
item.description: A mixed bag of music from Skycam, Final Boss, Humanboy, Ensimismada, Neko Neko, Poison Popcorn and Kings of Prussia. Also featuring an interesting phone conversation about the security threat posed by exploding fish with Dr. John Reid, hardline UK Home Secretary...
item.dc:creator: Distortio
